name: Late Night Broadcast
description:
Late Night Broadcast is a narrative-driven rhythm game, where you play as Yvonne, a radio host for the town of Index, Washington.

On an ordinary night, Yvonne accidentally intercepts a frequency  coming from... somewhere?

To understand what's happening, you must continue your show. Interact with the town folk by accepting calls, and play music, represented through short and enjoyable beat maps.

If you cannot access the downloadable, check out the full playthrough video in the screenshots section of this page!

controls

WASD or ARROW KEYS for the arrow beat map

SPACEBAR or CTRL for the shrinking stars beat map

MOUSE CLICK to interact with dialogue
